subject: Web3
title: DAO Treasury Mismanagement
description: A quick win: understand DAO Treasury Mismanagement.

hook.text: Some DAOs held billions in their own token, spent lavishly during the bull market, and ran out of money in the crash.

buildup.text: Treasuries denominated in volatile tokens can lose 90% of their value in a bear market.

discovery.text: DAOs that diversified into stablecoins and traditional assets fared better. Risk management proved essential.

twist.text: Selling the DAO's own token to diversify tanks its price. Members resist the very action that would save the treasury.

climax.text: Treasury management is a solved problem in traditional finance. DAOs are relearning these lessons the hard way.

punchline.text: Don't keep all your treasury in one volatile token. DAOs learned this the expensive way.

quiz.question: Why is it risky for DAOs to hold their treasury primarily in their own token?
options: The treasury value crashes when the token price drops
